meanings.definition: Living tissue, especially the flesh under the skin

meanings.definition: To move or make something move quickly

meanings.sent2: The horse quicks along the trail with great speed.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel quicks up the tree to escape the chasing cat.
meanings.sent4: Time quicks by when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The wind quicks through the leaves, creating a soothing sound.
